description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Avatar Rumble is back and better than ever! Wield hammers, swords and raw ki energy as you battle across a variety of stages inspired by a selection of Xbox Live Indies!
description.short: Avatar Rumble is back and better than ever! Wield hammers, swords and raw ki energy as you battle across a variety of stages inspired by a selection of Xbox Live Indies!
